name: echo-fullstack
description: Full-stack Echo application with Next.js, FastAPI, ChromaDB, and OpenRouter

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend -- --coverage && cd backend && pytest --cov=app
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && flake8 app && black --check app
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black app && isort app
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
